mapper.update: update sys_device set status = '0' where id = #{id};
update sys_device_lend set return_time = now() where device_id = #{id};
update sys_device set status = '2' where id = #{deviceId}
mapper.select: select name, images, model, price, count(*) count, lab_id labId from sys_device where status = '0' and lab_id = #{labId} and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') group by model

select name, images, price, model, count(*) count from sys_device where id in (select device_id from sys_device_lend where user_id = #{userId} and return_time is null) and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') group by model
select id from sys_device where model = #{deviceVo.model} and `status` = '2' limit 1;
select status from sys_attendance where appointment_id = #{appointmentId} and user_id = #{userId};
select id from sys_device where lab_id = #{deviceVo.labId} and model = #{deviceVo.model} and status = '0' limit 1;
